item.description: ã€As AI-driven apps become more sophisticated, there’s an increasing need for them to mimic collaborative problem solving – like a team of domain experts working together. Multi-agent apps offer exactly that: collections of specialized agents that cooperate to handle complex tasks. But to make them production-grade, you need more than just clever prompts – you […]ã€‘éšç€AIé©±åŠ¨çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå˜å¾—è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤æ‚ï¼Œä»–ä»¬è¶Šæ¥è¶Šéœ€è¦æ¨¡ä»¿åä½œé—®é¢˜è§£å†³é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå°±åƒä¸€ä¸ªå›¢é˜Ÿä¸“å®¶å›¢é˜Ÿä¸€èµ·å·¥ä½œã€‚å¤šä»£ç†åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºæä¾›äº†ï¼šåˆä½œå¤„ç†å¤æ‚ä»»åŠ¡çš„ä¸“é—¨ä»£ç†çš„é›†åˆã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è¦ä½¿å®ƒä»¬æˆä¸ºç”Ÿäº§çº§ï¼Œæ‚¨ä¸ä»…éœ€è¦å·§å¦™çš„æç¤º - æ‚¨[â€¦]

item.description: ã€The "Open in VS Code" workflow, part of the Azure AI Foundry extension for Visual Studio Code, accelerates developer velocity by integrating agent or model API endpoints and code samples into a new workspace in VS Code for Web.
